title: Fabio & Giada's wedding
welcome_text: Welcome into our wedding page, handcrafted for you by us.
we_cant_wait: We can't wait to share this day with you!
dreamy_honeymoon: We haven't set up a proper giftlist but we are collecting money to live our dreamy honeymoon and live forever happily after!
contribute: If you're here, you must have received your invitation, so please use the name on your card and the code to contribute to our giftlist.
thank_you: Thank you for being part of our story!
name: Name:
